org.adroitlogic.ultraesb.api.cache

Class CacheType

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum
      • org.adroitlogic.ultraesb.api.cache.CacheType
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable

    public class CacheType
extends java.lang.Enum
    Represents the type of a cache, which may vary depending on the call you made to get hold of it. You could find a complete description of the cache types in the Cache interface
    Since:
    1.4.0
    See Also:
    Cache, Serialized Form

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract boolean isDistributed()
      Whether this cache type is distributed or in other-words replicated among the cluster
      abstract boolean isPermanent()
      Whether this cache type is permanent or in other-words guaranteed to exist throughout the session
      abstract boolean isPersistent()
      Whether this cache type is persistent or in other-words guaranteed to exist within different sessions after JVM restart
